Module javafx.graphics
Package javafx.css

Class SimpleSelector

java.lang.Object
javafx.css.Selector
javafx.css.SimpleSelector
public final class SimpleSelector
extends Selector
A simple selector which behaves according to the CSS standard.
Since:
9
